name: Syenite Wings
description:
Have you ever thought about how it'd feel to be a goat? What about being a goat trying to climb a mystical mountain? If the answer to these questions is yes, this game is perfect for you! 

In this game, you play as a little goat trying to climb and explore the Syenite Mountain, a mystical place with an old legend: The golden cucumber. What does it do? Welp, that's up to you to figure it out!
